statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PartnerID , AA.BusinessID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, BB.Name as BizName , BB.BizNo , BB.RepName
, CC.PartnerName
FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBusiness BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BusinessID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TPartner CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerID = CC.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID#
AND AA.BusinessID = #BusinessID#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartnerBusiness ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PartnerID, BusinessID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PartnerID#, #BusinessID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartnerBusiness SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PartnerID = #PartnerID# , BusinessID = #BusinessID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select: SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM DBO.TPartnerBusiness WHERE PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM DBO.TPartnerBusiness WHERE PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.TPartnerBusiness SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
